alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:53AM EST until January 12 at 6:15AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CST FOR SPENCER...NORTHWESTERN DAVIESS AND EAST CENTRAL HENDERSON COUNTIES... At 452 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eureka, or 7 miles west of Rockport, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grandview and Santa Claus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Indiana near Mile Marker 60. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 15 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
